indextitle: Perfect preparation to become an Airbnb super host
indexsubtitle: Smart home device and accommodation management platform integrated package.
allincontrol:
All in control with
the Premo App
packagestitle: The easiest way to become a host
packagessub:
Primo is a smart accommodation management platform that supports convenient operation of rental accommodation such as Airbnb.
Interested in hosting your home? You can easily manage your accommodation with a monthly subscription.
video1: With Premo There is no need to give the guest a password or key directly.
video2: With One-click you apartment will get a cleaning and furnishings at the level of a five-star hotel.
video3: With Premo you get a Reduced waste on management costs with a real-time monitoring app.
cta:
Register the host authentication hot place in the app, or set the security mode so that you can go out with confidence.
A variety of smart home environments lead to high guest satisfaction.
